item.title: Notes on “Docker for Note.js Projects …”
item.description: Reference to the course: Docker for Note.js Projects from a Docker Captain I will update this post while continuing advance through the course. Last updated: 25 February 2023. Docker Compose basics Docker Compose is made of two things: the Compose CLI, and Compose file. Docker Compose CLI is mostly a substitute for Docker CLI. It is most useful in development environment. Docker Compose file is usually named docker-compose.yml: services: web: image: sample-01 build: .

item.description: Reference to the course: Docker Mastery: with Kubernetes +Swarm from a Docker Captain I will update this post while continuing advance through the course. Last updated: 25 February 2023. Image vs Container An Image is the application we want to run. A Container is an instance of that image running as a process. We can have many containers running off the same image. Containers Run a container docker container run --publish 80:80 --name my_server nginx --publish (short -p): Publish port 80 on local machines, and sends all traffic from it, to program running in container on port 80.
